title: Black Magic
description: Though her grandfather’s legendary talisman is in the hands of her biggest enemy, Samara McKinley and the Ima pack have even more important issues to deal with right now—like finding out how to fight against the black magic that Jason Masterson, Alpha of the Vyka pack and their arch rival, is using. Will they overcome the obstacles they face along the way and be able to conquer the evil that awaits them?By the bestselling authors of the Howl series, Black Magic is a riveting tale of romance, friendship, and the true test of alliances.
author: Jody Morse
